post.summary: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN in bulk
post.description: Gets all commissions and possible reductions by EAN, condition and optionally price. No more than 100 EAN`s can be sent in a single request.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

404.description: Not found: The requested item could not been found.

get.summary: Get all commissions and reductions by EAN per single EAN
get.description: Commissions can be filtered by condition, which defaults to NEW. If price is provided, the exact commission amount will also be calculated.

parameters.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

parameters.name: condition

get.summary: Get LVB/FBB inventory
get.description: The inventory endpoint is a specific LVB/FBB endpoint. It only provides information about your fulfillment by bol.com inventory. This endpoint does not provide information about your own stock.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Filter inventory by quantity.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: Filter inventory by stock level.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter inventory by NCK‘s stock level.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Filter inventory by EAN or product title.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

get.summary: Get all invoices
get.description: Gets a list of invoices, by default from the past 4 weeks. The optional period parameter can be used to retrieve invoices from a specific date range in the past. Invoices and their specifications can be downloaded separately in different media formats with the ‘GET an invoice by id’ and the ‘GET an invoice specification by id’ calls. The available media types differ per invoice and are listed per invoice within the response. Note: the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period to get invoices for. The period parameter has to comply to the ISO 6801 standard. The format of this standard is as follows: yyyy-mm-dd/yyyy-mm-dd. The period can be no longer than 32 days. The list of invoices is sorted on date in descending order.

get.summary: Get an invoice by invoice id
get.description: Gets an invoice by invoice id. The available media types differ per invoice and are listed within the response from the ‘GET all invoices’ call. Note: the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.

parameters.name: invoice-id
parameters.description: The id of the invoice

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

get.summary: Get an invoice specification by invoice id
get.description: Gets an invoice specification for an invoice with a paginated list of its transactions. The available media types differ per invoice specification and are listed within the response from the ‘GET all invoices’ call. Note, the media types listed in the response must be given in our standard API format.

parameters.name: invoice-id
parameters.description: The id of the invoice.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to get.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

put.description: Offers are uniquely identified by the combination of EAN and condition. When inserting an EAN and condition combination that is already known as an offer, this request will result in an update for that offer. When inserting an EAN and condition combination that is not yet known as an offer, it will result in a newly created offer.

get.summary: Create offers CSV file
get.description: Creates a CSV file containing all offers filtered by published status. If the published status isn't provided, all offers are included. The URL to the created CSV file is returned which can be used in the call to download the CSV file.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the returned offers by published status.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

get.summary: Gets the status of an asynchronous process by entity id and event type for a seller
get.description: Retrieve a list of process statuses, which shows information regarding previously executed PUT/POST requests in descending order. You need to supply an entity id and event type.

parameters.name: entity-id
parameters.description: The entity id is not unique so you need to provide an event type. The entity id can either be order item id, transport id, return number or inbound reference.

parameters.name: event-type
parameters.description: The event type can only be used in combination with the entity id.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to get with max 25 results per page.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

get.summary: Get the status of an asynchronous process by id
get.description: Retrieve a specific process-status, which shows information regarding a previously executed PUT/POST request. All PUT/POST requests on the other endpoints will supply a process-status-id in the related response. You can use this id to retrieve a status by using the endpoint below.

parameters.name: process-status-id
parameters.description: The id of the process status being requested. This id is supplied in every response to a PUT/POST request on the other endpoints.

400.description: Bad request: The sent request does not meet the API specification. Please check the error message(s) for more information.

AddressDetails.title: AddressDetails
AddressDetails.description: The address details of the order

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

dateTime.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the article was cancelled.

reasonCode.description: The code representing the reason for cancellation.

trackAndTrace.description: The track and trace code associated with this transport. The entered track and trace code will be verified. If you do not have the code, please omit this attribute entirely.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

percentage.description: Percentage of offer price. This percentage varies per product category.

price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

totalCost.description: Total applicable fee calculated based on the offer price provided.

totalCostWithoutReduction.description: Total applicable fee calculated based on the offer price which would be in effect if you do not meet the maximum price criteria.

timeSlots.description: An available timeslot to be reserved for inbound shipments.

creationDate.description: The date the inbound shipment was created in ISO 8601 format.

id.description: A unique id for an inbound shipment.

labellingService.description: Indicates whether the inbound will be labeled by bol.com or not.

reference.description: A user defined reference to identify the inbound shipment with.

state.description: The current state of the inbound shipment.

timeSlot.description: The chosen timeslot for the inbound shipment.

labellingService.description: Indicates whether the inbound will be labeled by bol.com or not.

reference.description: A user defined reference to identify the inbound shipment with.

timeSlot.description: The chosen timeslot for the inbound shipment.

bsku.description: The BSKU number associated with this product.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

nckStock.description: The stock that can't be sold (unsaleable)

stock.description: The stock that can be sold (saleable).

totalCount.description: The total amount of unique numbers.

totalPageCount.description: The total amount of available pages with offers.

url.description: URL pointing to a CSV file that can be used in the call to download the CSV file.

dateTimeOrderPlaced.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format the order was placed.

cancelRequest.description: True or False. True only if the consumer has cancelled the order before the seller has shipped it.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

fulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

latestDeliveryDate.description: Result of the date the order was placed combined with the delivery promise made by the seller. This field has been renamed from “PromisedDeliveryDate”.

offerPrice.description: Price for the entire product amount. This means the Item Price multiplied by the Quantity.

offerReference.description: Value provided by seller through Offer API as ‘ReferenceCode’.

orderItemId.description: The id for the product (1 order can have multiple order items).

quantity.description: Amount of the product being ordered.

title.description: Title of the product as shown on the webshop.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Order item details from an order

createTimestamp.description: Time of creation of the response.

description.description: Describes the action that is being processed.

entityId.description: The id of the object being processed. E.g. in case of a shipment process id, you will receive the id of the order item being processed.

errorMessage.example: The item is already shipped or cancelled.

eventType.description: Name of the requested action that is being processed.

links.description: Lists available actions applicable to this endpoint.

status.description: Status of the action being processed.

bsku.description: The BSKU number associated with this product.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

state.description: The current state of the inbound product.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

quantity.description: Number of products to generate labels for.

discount.description: The discount of the item that has been sold.

labelType.description: The type of the label, representing the way an item is being transported.

purchasePrice.description: The price the item has been bought for.

retailerPrice.description: The price the item has been sold for.

shippingLabelCode.description: An unique code referring to the shipping label.

transporterCode.description: A code representing the transporter which is being used for transportation.

costReduction.description: Amount the will be deducted from the commission fee if the maximum price criteria is met.

endDate.description: Date at which time this commission reduction will end.

maximumPrice.description: Maximum offer price that can be used to still benefit from a commission reduction.

startDate.description: Date from which time this commission reduction is applicable.

deliveryCode.description: The delivery promise that applies to this product.

description.description: A description that is only applicable when the chosen condition is unequal to “NEW”. Note: it will be ignored if condition is NEW. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 2000.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

fulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

publish.description: Boolean (true/false) determining whether the seller desires the product to be offered for sale on the bol.com website. Note: even when set to true, other factors may cause the offer not to be online.

quantityInStock.description: The amount of items in stock minus handled orders. As compared to the stock you sent us.

referenceCode.description: A value that may help you identify this particular offer when receiving orders. This element can optionally be left empty. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 20.

title.description: Title of the product as shown on the bol.com webshop. When the EAN is unknown at bol.com, your input will be shown. However, the bol.com title will be shown when it entails a known EAN. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 500.

unreservedStock.description: The amount of items in stock minus handled orders. As compared to the stock you sent us.

condition.description: Condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN, this means one EAN can be linked to multiple offers. Please choose the EAN and condition combination you wish to delete. Note: if you do not specify a condition, all conditions for this EAN will be deleted.

ean.description: EAN number associated with this offer.
The EAN number associated with this product.

fulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

handled.description: Boolean (true/false) determining whether the return was handled.

handlingResult.description: The handling result requested by the user.

processingDateTime.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the return was processed.

processingResult.description: The processing result of the return.

quantity.description: Amount of the product being ordered.

registrationDateTime.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format of registration.

returnNumber.description: Specifies which return item is being handled.

title.example: Harry Potter en de steen der wijzen

trackAndTrace.description: The track and trace code associated with this transport. The entered track and trace code will be verified. If you do not have the code, please omit this attribute entirely.

shipmentDate.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the order item was shipped.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

fulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

latestDeliveryDate.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the order was promised to be delivered.

offerPrice.description: Price for the entire product amount. This means the item price multiplied by the quantity.

offerReference.description: Value provided by seller through Offer API as ‘ReferenceCode’.

orderDate.description: The date/time in ISO 8601 format when the order was placed.

orderItemId.description: Item being sent. The order item id can be retrieved through the order request.

quantity.description: Amount of the product being ordered.

shippingLabelCode.description: Specifies shipping label to be used for this shipment. Can be retrieved through the shipping label endpoint.

state.description: The state that was transitioned into.

stateDate.description: The transition date and time in ISO 8601 format.

errorCode.description: If published is set to N, this field will show the associated error code.

errorMessage.description: Explains the reason why this offer is not shown if Published is N.

valid.description: Shows whether or not this offer is valid on the website. It is set to 'false' by bol.com if any errors occur in this offer or if it is out of stock.

end.description: The timeslot end date and time in ISO 8601 format.

start.description: The timeslot start date and time in ISO 8601 format.

trackAndTrace.description: The track and trace code associated with this transport. The entered track and trace code will be verified. If you do not have the code, please omit this attribute entirely.

transporterCode.description: Specify the transporter used to fulfil this shipment.

UpsertRequest.title: UpsertRequest
UpsertRequest.description: An array of offers to create or update

condition.description: The condition of the offer. It is possible to have more conditions per EAN.

deliveryCode.description: The delivery promise that applies to this product.

description.description: A description that is only applicable when the chosen condition is unequal to “NEW”. Note: it will be ignored if condition is NEW. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 2000.

ean.description: The EAN number associated with this product.

fulfilmentMethod.description: Specifies whether this shipment has been fulfilled by the retailer (FBR) or fulfilled by bol.com (FBB).

price.description: The price of the product with a period as a decimal separator.

publish.description: Boolean (true/false) determining whether the seller desires the product to be offered for sale on the bol.com website. Note: even when set to true, other factors may cause the offer not to be online.

quantityInStock.description: The amount of items in stock. Minimum value: 0. Maximum value: 999.

referenceCode.description: A value that may help you identify this particular offer when receiving orders. This element can optionally be left empty. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 20.

title.description: Title of the product as shown on the bol.com webshop. When the EAN is unknown at bol.com, your input will be shown. However, the bol.com title will be shown when it entails a known EAN. Attention: Maximum amount of characters: 500.
